title: NA congratulates Justice Sarfraz Dogar on taking oath as CJ IHC
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 08 (APP):Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq Tuesday extended his heartfelt congratulations to Justice Sardar Sarfraz Dogar on taking oath as Chief Justice of the Islamabad High Court.
In a statement issued here, the Speaker conveyed his best wishes to the newly appointed Chief Justice, lauding his professional integrity and legal acumen.
“Justice Sardar Sarfraz Dogar is a highly respected and seasoned legal expert,” said the Speaker. “His appointment as Chief Justice of the Islamabad High Court is a commendable and timely decision.”
Ayaz Sadiq praised Justice Dogar’s reputation as a dignified and principled judge, saying that his elevation would enhance the prestige and independence of the judiciary.
He expressed hope that Chief Justice Dogar would uphold the supremacy of the Constitution and the rule of law and would continue to deliver swift and fair justice to the people of the country.
